trans-unit.source: Determines whether the operation should be retried and the interval until the next retry.
trans-unit.target: Determines whether the operation should be retried and the interval until the next retry.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.RetryContext</codeEntityReference> object that indicates the number of retries, the results of the last request, and whether the next retry should happen in the primary or secondary location, and specifies the location mode.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.RetryContext</codeEntityReference> object that indicates the number of retries, the results of the last request, and whether the next retry should happen in the primary or secondary location, and specifies the location mode.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.RetryInfo</codeEntityReference> object that indicates the location mode, and whether the next retry should happen in the primary or secondary location.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.RetryInfo</codeEntityReference> object that indicates the location mode, and whether the next retry should happen in the primary or secondary location.

trans-unit.source: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the operation will not be retried.
trans-unit.target: If <codeInline>null</codeInline>, the operation will not be retried.
